com.navis.framework.portal.context.server.service

Class ClusterNodeLifecycleService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.portal.context.server.service.AbstractLifecycleService
      • com.navis.framework.portal.context.server.service.ClusterNodeLifecycleService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILifecycleService

    public class ClusterNodeLifecycleService
extends AbstractLifecycleService
    Adds a cluster node during the startup and sets the status to SHUTDOWN during the shutdown. It also starts a heartbeat thread to update the heartbeat timestamp.
    Author:
    Ram Satish
